statements: SELECT * FROM reports_on_energy_consumption;
SELECT report_id, energy_consumed, cost_savings FROM reports_on_energy_consumption WHERE report_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM reports_on_energy_consumption GROUP BY location_id;
SELECT report_date, cost_savings FROM reports_on_energy_consumption WHERE cost_savings > 1000 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(cost_savings) AS average_cost_savings FROM reports_on_energy_consumption;
SELECT * FROM reports_on_energy_consumption WHERE report_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_id, energy_consumed FROM reports_on_energy_consumption WHERE cost_savings > 1000 ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT location_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM reports_on_energy_consumption GROUP BY location_id HAVING total_energy_consumed > 5000 ORDER BY total_energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT * FROM reports_on_energy_consumption WHERE energy_consumed BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY location_id ASC, report_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(cost_savings) AS avg_cost_savings, MAX(cost_savings) AS max_cost_savings FROM reports_on_energy_consumption;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption
SELECT device_id, energy_consumed, cost_saved FROM energy_consumption WHERE date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT location_id, date, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM smart_lighting WHERE power_consumption < 50
SELECT location_id, lightbulb_model, dimmable FROM smart_lighting ORDER BY location_id ASC
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT device_id, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption WHERE cost_saved > 50 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location_id, date, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_consumed BETWEEN 100 AND 200 AND date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption JOIN smart_lighting ON energy_consumption.location_id = smart_lighting.location_id WHERE smart_lighting.dimmable = TRUE;
SELECT location_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY location_id HAVING total_energy_consumed > 500 ORDER BY total_energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT report_id, location FROM cost_savings WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM smart_lights WHERE status = 'ON' ORDER BY light_id ASC;
SELECT location, cost_saved FROM smart_lights ORDER BY cost_saved DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption;
SELECT report_id, date, location FROM cost_savings WHERE cost_savings > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM smart_lights GROUP BY location ORDER BY total_energy_consumed DESC;
SELECT report_id, location, cost_savings FROM cost_savings UNION SELECT light_id, location, cost_saved FROM smart_lights WHERE cost_saved > 500 ORDER BY cost_savings ASC;
SELECT date, time, energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption WHERE location = 'Office Building' AND energy_consumed BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_report;
SELECT device_id, consumption_kWh FROM energy_consumption_report ORDER BY consumption_kWh DESC;
SELECT report_id, date_published FROM cost_savings_report WHERE savings_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM smart_lights WHERE is_smart = TRUE ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT light_id, power_consumption FROM smart_lights WHERE power_consumption BETWEEN 20 AND 50;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption_report;
SELECT report_id, consumption_kWh FROM energy_consumption_report WHERE date_published > '2022-01-01';
SELECT cost_savings_report.device_id, savings_amount, date_published, location FROM cost_savings_report JOIN smart_lights ON cost_savings_report.device_id = smart_lights.light_id;
SELECT schedule_id, light_id, start_time, end_time, day_of_week FROM smart_lighting_schedule WHERE is_smart = TRUE ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT report_id, device_id, SUM(consumption_kWh) AS total_consumption FROM energy_consumption_report GROUP BY device_id HAVING total_consumption > 1000;
SELECT * FROM room WHERE building_id = 1;
SELECT room_name, floor_number FROM room ORDER BY floor_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_consumed > 100;
SELECT building_name, address FROM building WHERE total_floors < 5;
SELECT id, lighting_type, wattage FROM smart_lighting WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM energy_consumption WHERE energy_consumed > 100 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT room_id, SUM(energy_consumed) AS total_energy_consumed FROM energy_consumption GROUP BY room_id ORDER BY total_energy_consumed DESC
SELECT e.*, r.room_name FROM energy_consumption e INNER JOIN room r ON e.room_id = r.id WHERE e.cost > 50 AND r.building_id = 1
SELECT * FROM smart_lighting WHERE wattage BETWEEN 50 AND 100 AND status = 'ON' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT building_name, total_floors FROM building ORDER BY building_name, total_floors DESC LIMIT 5
